cards.detail: You recently had a condition recorded that may be an adverse event from high blood pressure treatment. Contacting your care team will help them resolve it.|[{"id": "adverseevent-AE-UntreatedAdverseEvent-2", "type": "adverse-event", "label": "Brief loss of consciousness"},{"id": "adverseevent-AE-UntreatedAdverseEvent-1", "type": "adverse-event", "label": "Acute kidney problem"}]|at-most-one|
